strapiEvent.name: Hydroponics
strapiEvent.location: Botanical Garden of the Ozarks - Fayetteville, AR
strapiEvent.description:
With Daniel Dozier of GSS Group and Joseph Chidiac

Learn about Hydronic Crop Production, including its history, the forms it can take, how it mimics nature, and why its used. In addition, we will dive deeper into system design and methods, learn how to formulate fertilizrs, and maintain healthy systems with beautiful plants. Ready-made hydroponic systems will be available for purchase.

All attendees will go home with a free plant grown using hydroponics!

$20/members or $30/nonmembers
